dt.patient:
SELECT
	DATA ->> 'id'	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Patient'
ORDER BY
	data ->> 'id';
dt.gender:
SELECT
	DATA ->> 'gender'	AS	"patient_gender",
DATA ->> 'id'	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Patient'
ORDER BY
	data ->> 'id';
dt.zipcode:
SELECT
	DATA ->> 'id'	AS	"patient_identifier_value",
DATA -> 'address' -> 0 ->> 'postalCode'	AS	"patient_address_postalCode"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Patient'
ORDER BY
	data ->> 'id';
dt.birthdate:
SELECT
	DATA ->> 'birthDate'	AS	"patient_birthDate",
DATA ->> 'id'	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Patient'
ORDER BY
	data ->> 'id';
